title: Citi Organizes Second Annual Citigold Polo Tournament in Costa Rica
summary: San José - Citi, via its preferential Citigold brand, organized the second annual edition of Costa Rica's leading polo tournament. Polo is an exclusive sport played in countries around the world, but rarely competitively. In Costa Rica, polo has been practiced for several decades, with tournaments held every year. This year's Citigold tournament was hosted at Ciudad Hacienda, Los Reyes beginning at 11 am, with the participation of the country's best players.
tag-1: Citi Organizes Second Annual Citigold Polo Tournament in Costa Rica
tag-3: San José – Citi, via its preferential Citigold brand, organized the second annual edition of Costa Rica's leading polo tournament. Polo is an exclusive sport played in countries around the world, but rarely competitively. In Costa Rica, polo has been practiced for several decades, with tournaments held every year. This year's Citigold tournament was hosted at Ciudad Hacienda, Los Reyes beginning at 11 am, with the participation of the country's best players.
tag-4: In the sport of polo, two teams of four players each face off on horseback and use a mallet to try to score a small wooden or plastic ball into the opponent's goal, marked with wicker posts. The winning team is the one that scores the most goals. At stake in this year's competition was the Citigold 2013 Cup.
tag-5: "Citi marks 45 years in Costa Rica this year, and we want to celebrate our anniversary alongside our clients," explained Marcelo Gorrini, General Manager of Citi Costa Rica. "We set out to organize the best polo tournament in Costa Rica as one of the unique events we offer our Citigold clients."
tag-6: Citi launched its Citigold segment in Costa Rica in 2009 to offer its clients the highest quality benefits and financial services, taking advantage of Citi's global presence and experience.
tag-7: "Citigold is our premium brand, designed to recognize our best clients and offer them exclusive, world-class services and benefits," added Soledad Rovira, Citigold's Director in Costa Rica.
tag-8: The winner of the II Citigold Polo Tournament was the Black team, made up of Ivan Maldonado, Edgar Zurcher, Ronald Zurcher, Juan Pablo Solano and Fernando Chavarría.
